title: Final relative positions of student and raft

content.question: A student stands at one end of a raft floating in a pool with equally spaced marks along the bottom, as shown above. The student and the raft have the same mass. The student walks to the opposite end of the raft. Which of the following best shows the final locations of the raft and student relative to the marks at the bottom of the pool? Assume that there is no drag force between the raft and the water.

choices.label: Option A consists of a figure showing a student standing on the right end of the raft that is floating in the pool. Along the bottom of the pool are six equally spaced intervals indicated by tick marks going from left to right. The raft is two intervals in length. The left end of the raft is located three intervals from the far left side of the figure.

Option B consists of a figure showing a student standing on the right end of the raft that is floating in the pool. Along the bottom of the pool are six equally spaced intervals indicated by tick marks going from left to right. The raft is two intervals in length. The left end of the raft is located two intervals from the far left side of the figure.

Option C consists of a figure showing a student standing on the right end of the raft that is floating in the pool. Along the bottom of the pool are six equally spaced intervals indicated by tick marks going from left to right. The raft is two intervals in length. The left end of the raft is located one interval from the far left side of the figure.

Option D consists of a figure showing a student standing on the right end of the raft that is floating in the pool. Along the bottom of the pool are six equally spaced intervals indicated by tick marks going from left to right. The raft is two intervals in length. The left end of the raft is located at the far left side of the figure.

content.answer: Option C consists of a figure showing a student standing on the right end of the raft that is floating in the pool. Along the bottom of the pool are six equally spaced intervals indicated by tick marks going from left to right. The raft is two intervals in length. The left end of the raft is located one interval from the far left side of the figure.
